external_games.name: Street Fighter II: Ryu vs. Sagat

name: Street Fighter II: Ryu vs. Sagat
summary: One of the best possible fights in Street Fighter 2. The karate genius, Ryu against the king of Thai Muay-Thai, Sagat. The Hadoken is easier to execute, as well as the Shoryuken. The classic punches are made with the keys A S D and the kicks with Z X C.
